title: How to Add a Subscribe Button to Your YouTube Videos

steps.title: Go to the YouTube website.
steps.content: Go to the YouTube website. It's located at: https://www.youtube.com/ .

steps.title: Sign into your channel.
steps.content: Sign into your channel. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Customize Channel.
steps.content: Click Customize Channel. Then click on Branding ("Add a Watermark" feature).

steps.title: Choose your photo logo or icon.
steps.content: Choose your photo logo or icon. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click Browse.
steps.content: Click Browse. Choose the file that you want to use as your subscribe button. You can choose your photo logo or an icon.

steps.title: Click "Save".
steps.content: Click "Save". There will now appear a subscribe button for each one of your YouTube videos.
